comments: This contract is a multi-year contract. This contract includes one or more options and amendments. This contract was competitively sourced and was awarded by Public Works and Government Services Canada. This contract is against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependant on the operational requirements of the department.
